High price tags, complicated set up, limited functionality - too many barriers stand between your business and the powerful digital signage displays you envision. We definitely think so. Introducing Fugo - Digital Signage Player for Chrome.

With Fugo, you can easily manage your screens and content from anywhere at any time.
